content: You’ve summed up the whole problem with definitions within the industry because you are able to see UX and design as one and the same. This is a sign of a good designer in my mind because as you say good design is good user experience. Personally I’d like to see an end to the split in naming, roles and responsibilities. I think you are either able to define and solve a problem then present it back coherently or not (experience in a career aside).
